title: Dhanush Soundarya Rajinikanth auto rickshaw accident police complaint false news - Tamil Movie News
text: Dhanush's request to youngsters after his fan's sad death Earlier this morning, it was reported that filmmaker & Superstar Rajinikanth's younger daughter Soundarya Rajinikanth's car had ran into a standing auto-rickshaw at Alwarpet, Chennai, injuring the driver. It was also alleged that actor Dhanush, being Soundarya's brother-in-law had rushed to the scene and persuaded the auto driver against filing a police complaint. However, all of the above seems to be misinformation circulated by someone. Dhanush was neither at scene, nor did such an accident even take place. The whole rumor is just a bad excuse for a joke. Dhanush, is currently at Madurai, where he was summoned by the Court in relation to the Paternity suite filed by an aged couple.
